IRPact_modellierung.agents.companyAgents

Class CompanyAgentFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • IRPact_modellierung.agents.companyAgents.CompanyAgentFactory

  • public class CompanyAgentFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    The CompanyAgentFactory serves to add the company agents to the simulation. It manages the agent IDs, maps them to the agent names and serves to add them to the simulation container.

      • createCompanyAgent

        public CompanyAgent createCompanyAgent(SimulationContainer simulationContainer,
                                       CompanyAgentConfiguration agentConfiguration,

      • createCompanyAgent

        public CompanyAgent createCompanyAgent(SimulationContainer simulationContainer,
                                       double informationAuthority,
                                       java.util.Set<Product> productPortfolio,
                                       ProductQualityManipulationScheme productQualityManipulationScheme,
                                       ManagementDecisionScheme managementDecisionScheme,
                                       AdvertisementScheme advertisementScheme)
        Method to create the agents, manage their ID and names and add them to the simulation. An agent with the specified parameters and a running index will be created and added to the simulation container.
        Parameters:
        simulationContainer - The container the simulation runs in
        productPortfolio - The products the company agent manages
        productQualityManipulationScheme - The productQualityManipulationScheme used by the company agent to create
        managementDecisionScheme - The managementDecisionScheme used by the company agent to create
        advertisementScheme - The advertisementScheme used by the company agent to create
        Returns:
        The agent created by the method

      • createCompanyAgent

        public CompanyAgent createCompanyAgent(SimulationContainer simulationContainer,
                                       double informationAuthority,
                                       java.util.Set<Product> productPortfolio,
                                       ProductQualityManipulationScheme productQualityManipulationScheme,
                                       ManagementDecisionScheme managementDecisionScheme,
                                       AdvertisementScheme advertisementScheme,
                                       java.lang.String name)
        Method to create the agents, manage their ID and names and add them to the simulation. An agent with the specified parameters and a running index will be created and added to the simulation container.
        Parameters:
        simulationContainer - The container the simulation runs in
        productPortfolio - The products the company agent manages
        productQualityManipulationScheme - The productQualityManipulationScheme used by the company agent to create
        managementDecisionScheme - The managementDecisionScheme used by the company agent to create
        advertisementScheme - The advertisementScheme used by the company agent to create
        name - The name the agent should get
        Returns:
        The agent created by the method

      • productQualityManipulationSchemeLoader

        public static ProductQualityManipulationScheme productQualityManipulationSchemeLoader(java.lang.String productQualityManipulationSchemeQualifier)
                                                                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        The productQualityManipulationSchemeLoader creates an instance of the ProductQualityManipulationScheme qualified by the productQualityManipulationSchemeQualifier, if the corresponding scheme was implemented. If not it will raise the respective IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        productQualityManipulationSchemeQualifier - A String corresponding to the ProductManipulationScheme to be loaded
        Returns:
        An instance of the ProductManipulationScheme specified by the ProductManipulationSchemeQualifier
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - will be thrown when the ProductManipulationSchemeQualifier refers to an unimplemented scheme

        Throws:

      • advertisementSchemeLoader

        public static AdvertisementScheme advertisementSchemeLoader(java.lang.String advertisementSchemeQualifier,
                                                            java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> advertisementSchemeParameters,
                                                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Distribution> distributions)
                                                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        The AdvertisementSchemeLoader creates an instance of the AdvertisementScheme qualified by the advertisementSchemeQualifier, if the corresponding scheme was implemented. If not it will raise the respective IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        advertisementSchemeQualifier - A String corresponding to the AdvertisementScheme to be loaded
        distributions - The distributions used in the simulation
        Returns:
        An instance of the AdvertisementScheme specified by the advertisementSchemeQualifier
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - will be thrown when the advertisementSchemeQualifier refers to an unimplemented scheme
